TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandLineBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: (1) 确保包含连字符的值 (RC 括起来至少需要此) (2) 转义任何嵌入的引号。

span.span: (1) Make sure values containing hyphens are quoted (RC at least requires this) (2) Escape any embedded quotes.

summary.span: --应将文字双引号编写为 \" ""--doublequotes 前的反斜杠必须成对。

span.span: -- Literal double quotes should be written in the form \" not "" -- Backslashes falling just before doublequotes must be doubled.

summary.span: --原义双引号只能成对出现 (无法传递单字面值双引号) --函数双引号 (例如，处理空间) 最好将名称和值放在开关中，如/Dname = value。

span.span: -- Literal double quotes can only occur in pairs (you cannot pass a single literal double quote) -- Functional double quotes (for example to handle spaces) are best put around both name and value in switches like /Dname=value.

remarks.span: 下面是一些报价试验，将/D 开关与 CL 和 RC 预处理器一起使用。

span.span: Below are some quoting experiments, using the /D switch with the CL and RC preprocessor.

remarks.span: /D 开关比大多数开关稍微复杂一些，因为它具有名称 = 值对。

span.span: The /D switch is a little more tricky than most switches, because it has a name=value pair.

remarks.span: 下表包含了在第一列中传递交换机时预处理器实际嵌入的内容：

span.span: The table below contains what the preprocessor actually embeds when passed the switch in the first column:

remarks.span: CL 通过 cmd line CL via response file RC/DFOO = "A" a

span.span: CL via cmd line CL via response file RC /DFOO="A" A A

remarks.span: /D "FOO =" A "" A A/DFOO = A A

span.span: /D"FOO="A"" A A A /DFOO=A A A

remarks.span: /D "FOO = A" A

span.span: /D"FOO=A" A A

remarks.span: /DFOO = "A"

span.span: /DFOO=""A"" A A A
/DFOO=\"A\" "A" "A" /DFOO="""A""" "A" broken "A" /D"FOO=\"A\"" "A" "A" /D"FOO=""A""" "A" "A"

remarks.span: /DFOO = "A B" A B A B/D "FOO = A B" A B A B

span.span: /DFOO="A B" A B A B /D"FOO=A B" A B A B

remarks.span: /D "FOO =" A B "" 中断

span.span: /D"FOO="A B"" broken

remarks.span: /DFOO = \" a B \" 中断

span.span: /DFOO=\"A B\" broken

remarks.span: /D "FOO = \" A b \" " "a b" "a b" "a b"/D "FOO =" "a b" "" a b "中断中断

span.span: /D"FOO=\"A B\"" "A B" "A B" "A B" /D"FOO=""A B""" "A B" broken broken

remarks.span: 从我的试验 (仅包含 CL 和 RC) 似乎--文字双引号最可靠地以不 "" 的形式编写，而 \" doublequotes 之前的反斜杠必须加倍。

span.span: From my experiments (with CL and RC only) it seems that -- Literal double quotes are most reliably written in the form \" not "" -- Backslashes falling just before doublequotes must be doubled.

remarks.span: --包含原义双引号的值必须用引号引起来。

span.span: -- Values containing literal double quotes must be quoted.

remarks.span: --原义双引号只能成对出现 (无法传递单个字面双引号) --对于/Dname = 值样式开关，函数双引号 (例如，若要处理空间) 最好同时用于名称和值 (，则这些类型的开关不需要对它们的 "=" 符号进行特殊处理。

span.span: -- Literal double quotes can only occur in pairs (you cannot pass a single literal double quote) -- For /Dname=value style switches, functional double quotes (for example to handle spaces) are best put around both name and value (in other words, these kinds of switches don't need special treatment for their '=' signs).

remarks.span: --包含连字符的值应带引号;RC 需要这样做，而 CL 则没关系。

span.span: -- Values containing hyphens should be quoted; RC requires this, and CL does not mind.

summary.span: 此方法在命令行的后面追加一个空格 (如果它当前在文件名之前不为空) 。

span.span: This method appends a space to the command line (if it's not currently empty) before the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将命令行追加到任务项规范中，并在必要时将任务项规范括在引号中。This method appends the command line with a task item specification, and surrounds task item specification with quotations marks as necessary. 如果命令行不为空，则此方法还会在命令行的后面追加一个空格，在任务项规范之前。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the task item specification. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 [Ilasm.exe (IL 汇编程序) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler)运行的。The following example creates a that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler). 、 和 类用于生成运行任务所需的信息。The , , and classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task. [!code-csharp[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/CS/ILAsm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/VB/ILAsm.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendFileNameIfNotNull (string fileName);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendFileNameIfNotNull(string fileName) cil managed

public: void AppendFileNameIfNotNull(System::String ^ fileName);
member this.AppendFileNameIfNotNull : string -> unit

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要追加的文件名，如果为 null，则此方法不起作用

span.span: File name to append, if it's null this method has no effect

summary.span: 如有必要，追加文件名引用它。

span.span: Appends a file name quoting it if necessary.

summary.span: 此方法在命令行的后面追加一个空格 (如果它当前在文件名之前不为空) 。

span.span: This method appends a space to the command line (if it's not currently empty) before the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在命令行的后面追加文件名，并在必要时在文件名的两侧加上引号。This method appends the command line with a file name, and surrounds the file name with quotation marks as necessary. 如果文件名的第一个字符是短划线，则 `.\` 会将添加到文件名的开头，以将其与开关区分开来。If the first character of the file name is a dash, then `.\` is added to the beginning of the file name to distinguish it from a switch. 如果命令行不为空，则此方法还在命令行的后面追加一个空格。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file name. ## Examples `AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` 生成 `.\-StrangeFileName.cs` 。`AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` yields `.\-StrangeFileName.cs`.

span.span: AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs") => ".\-StrangeFileName.cs"

summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加文件名列表，并在必要时插入引号。

span.span: Appends the command line with a list of file names, inserting quotation marks if necessary.

summary.span: 此方法在命令行的后面追加一个空格 (如果它当前在文件名之前不为空) 。

span.span: This method appends a space to the command line (if it's not currently empty) before the file names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在命令行的后面追加文件名，并在必要时在文件名的两侧加上引号。This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary. 文件名用指定的分隔符分隔。The file names are separated by the specified delimiter. 如果命令行不为空，则此方法还会在命令行的后面追加一个空格。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names. ## Examples 请参阅中的示例 。See example in .

summary.span: 此方法在命令行的后面追加一个空格 (如果它当前在文件名之前不为空) 。

span.span: This method appends a space to the command line (if it's not currently empty) before the file names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在命令行的后面追加文件名，并在必要时在文件名的两侧加上引号。This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary. 文件名用指定的分隔符分隔。The file names are separated by the specified delimiter. 如果命令行不为空，则此方法还会在命令行的后面追加一个空格。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names. ## Examples `AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` 生成 `Alpha.cs,Beta.cs` 。`AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` yields `Alpha.cs,Beta.cs`.

span.span: AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",") => "Alpha.cs,Beta.cs"

span.span: Quotes are added if they are needed.

summary.span: 如果文件名的第一个字符为短划线，则为 ""。 \" 为避免混淆文件名与开关混淆，此方法不会在执行前将空格追加到命令行。

span.span: If the first character of the file name is a dash, ".\" is prepended to avoid confusing the file name with a switch This method does not append a space to the command line before executing.

remarks.span: 将来，此函数可能会修复 "text" 以处理嵌入的引号。

span.span: In the future, this function may fixup 'text' to handle literal embedded quotes.
AppendFileNameWithQuoting("-StrangeFileName.cs") => ".\-StrangeFileName.cs"

summary.span: 追加一个命令行开关，该开关采用 string [] 参数，并在必要时在各个文件名的两侧加上双引号。

span.span: Appends a command-line switch that takes a string[] parameter, and add double-quotes around the individual filenames if necessary.

summary.span: 此方法在命令行 (后面追加一个空格，如果在开关之前) 当前不为空。

span.span: This method appends a space to the command line (if it's not currently empty) before the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会在需要时将各个文件名封装在引号中。This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary. 如果命令行不为空，则此方法还会在命令行的后面追加一个空格。If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch. ## Examples `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` 生成 `/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"` 。`AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` yields `/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"`.

span.span: AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";") => "/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\""

summary.span: 在命令行的后面追加一个开关，但不尝试在开关参数的两侧加上引号。

span.span: Appends the command line with a switch, without attempting to encapsulate the switch parameters with quotation marks.

span.span: This is used to prevent parameter injection.

summary.span: 它是虚拟的，因此，如果需要在文件名中转义引号，则工具可以重写此方法

span.span: It's virtual so that tools can override this method if they want to have quotes escaped in filenames

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个虚拟方法，如果要允许在文件名中转义双引号，则应用程序可以重写此方法。 is a virtual method so that your applications can override this method if you want to allow double-quotes escaped in filenames.
